services.title: Development Tools
services.shortDescription: Development tools and resources to help streamline your coding workflow and improve productivity.
services.fullDescription: I share knowledge and recommendations about development tools that have helped improve my coding workflow. Based on my experience with tools like Cursor AI, VS Code extensions, and other productivity enhancers, I can provide guidance and resources. Currently offering consultation and knowledge sharing rather than full implementation services.
features: AI coding tool guidance (Cursor AI, GitHub Copilot)

aiTools.name: Cursor AI
aiTools.description: A revolutionary code editor built on VSCode that integrates Claude and GPT-4 language models to provide intelligent coding assistance with full codebase context understanding.

aiTools.name: GitHub Copilot
aiTools.description: An AI pair programmer that offers suggestions for whole lines or entire functions right inside your editor, powered by OpenAI Codex.

aiTools.name: Docker
aiTools.description: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers, ensuring consistency across development and production environments.

aiTools.name: Jest
aiTools.description: A comprehensive JavaScript testing framework with a focus on simplicity, supporting projects using Babel, TypeScript, Node.js, React, and more with intelligent test generation capabilities.

caseStudies.title: Personal Development Setup
caseStudies.outcome: Optimized personal development workflow using Cursor AI and modern VS Code extensions, improving coding efficiency and learning speed

caseStudies.title: Tool Recommendations for Fellow Developers
caseStudies.outcome: Shared knowledge through content creation about development tools, helping other developers discover productivity-enhancing tools

services.title: Vibe Coding
services.shortDescription: Custom web development with a focus on aesthetics, user experience, and unique visual identity.
services.fullDescription: My approach to web development focuses on creating visually appealing and unique web experiences. I enjoy combining modern frameworks like React and Astro with creative design principles to build websites that have personality and character. This represents my personal style and approach to development projects.

caseStudies.title: NosytLabs Website
caseStudies.outcome: Our own website showcases our Vibe Coding approach with unique aesthetics, animations, and interactive elements

services.title: Web Development
services.shortDescription: Web development services with a focus on modern frameworks like React and Astro.
services.fullDescription: We offer web development services with a focus on modern frameworks like React, Vue, and Astro. Our availability is limited as we primarily work on select projects that align with our expertise. We prioritize responsive design, performance optimization, and SEO best practices in all our web development work.

caseStudies.title: Portfolio Website Redesign
caseStudies.outcome: Created a responsive portfolio website using Astro and TailwindCSS, improving page load times and mobile experience

services.title: Mobile Development
services.shortDescription: Basic mobile application development with React Native for simple use cases.
services.fullDescription: We offer limited mobile development services primarily using React Native for cross-platform applications. Our focus is on simple, functional applications rather than complex enterprise solutions. Please note that our mobile development services are currently in beta and have limited availability.
features: Guidance for App Store and Google Play submission

caseStudies.title: Simple Task Management App
caseStudies.outcome: Developed a basic task management app with React Native for personal productivity tracking

services.title: 3D Printing Services
services.shortDescription: Small-scale 3D printing services for simple models and prototypes using Creality and Elegoo printers.
services.fullDescription: We offer small-scale 3D printing services for simple models and prototypes using our Creality and Elegoo printers. Our service is best suited for hobbyists, small projects, and educational purposes. Please note that our capacity is limited, and we primarily focus on FDM printing with PLA and PETG materials, with some resin printing capabilities for smaller detailed objects.
features: FDM printing with Creality Ender printers
Resin printing with Elegoo Mars (limited capacity)
Basic materials: PLA and PETG for FDM, standard resins
Local pickup or basic shipping options

caseStudies.title: Tabletop Gaming Miniatures
caseStudies.outcome: Created a set of custom gaming miniatures and terrain pieces for a local D&D group using resin printing

caseStudies.title: Replacement Parts for Home Appliances
caseStudies.outcome: Printed replacement knobs and brackets for household appliances, saving the cost of full replacements

caseStudies.title: Educational Models
caseStudies.outcome: Produced anatomical models for a biology class to enhance hands-on learning experiences

services.title: Content Creation
services.shortDescription: Basic content creation guidance for YouTube and Kick.com with a focus on tech and gaming content.
services.fullDescription: Based on our experience creating content for YouTube (formerly TycenYT) and Kick.com, we offer basic guidance and tips for content creators. Our focus is on tech reviews, gaming content, and tutorials. Please note that we offer limited consultation services rather than full production services, and our availability depends on our own content creation schedule.

caseStudies.title: YouTube Setup Guidance
caseStudies.outcome: Helped a tech enthusiast set up their first YouTube channel with proper equipment and basic SEO practices

caseStudies.title: Kick.com Stream Setup
caseStudies.outcome: Provided guidance on basic stream setup, OBS configuration, and engagement strategies for a new Kick.com streamer
